content: शनैस् {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} {@--1@} Slowly, gently, quietly. {@--2@} Gradually, by degrees, little by little; धर्मं संचिनुय च्छनैः; <ls>Ku. 3. 59</ls>; <ls>Ms. 3. 217.</ls> {@--3@} Successive ly, in due order, <ls>Ms. 1. 15.</ls> {@--4@} Mildly, softly. {@--5@} Tardily, sluggishly. {@--6@} Independently. (शनैः शनैः slowly, by slow degrees).
